content: *this little finger puppet ghoul is sure to spook up some halloween fun featured in bk4k lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80794ad published in by kids for kids skill level easy microspun article #910 3 colors 1 ball each *shown in coffee mocha mango* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers fiberfill stuffing small amount of black embroidery floss 1 chenille stem craft glue sewing needle and thread
